Date Notice Provided to Consumers: Once A&A’s forensic investigation revealed a breach impacting Maine residents, and had restored the integrity and security of the impacted systems, A&A prepared to notify those impacted individuals. Notifications to the impacted individuals in Maine were sent by U.S. Mail on January 9, 2019.
Date(s) of Discovery of Breach: A&A was notified of suspicious activity on August 17, 2018 and immediately launched a forensic investigation.  The forensic investigation concluded on December 7, 2018, revealing a breach impacting Maine residents.
Dates of Breach: Based upon A&A’s investigation to date, it appears that information entered on its website may have been exposed at various points in time, including from August 15, 2017 to January 4, 2019.

Date Notice Provided to Consumers: Once A&A’s forensic investigation revealed a breach impacting Maine residents, and had restored the integrity and security of the impacted systems, A&A prepared to notify those impacted individuals. Notifications to the impacted individuals in Maine were sent by U.S. Mail on January 9, 2019.
Date(s) of Discovery of Breach: A&A was notified of suspicious activity on August 17, 2018 and immediately launched a forensic investigation.  The forensic investigation concluded on December 7, 2018, revealing a breach impacting Maine residents.
Dates of Breach: Based upon A&A’s investigation to date, it appears that information entered on its website may have been exposed at various points in time, including from August 15, 2017 to January 4, 2019.

Date Notice Provided to Consumers: Once A&A’s forensic investigation revealed a breach impacting Maine residents, and had restored the integrity and security of the impacted systems, A&A prepared to notify those impacted individuals. Notifications to the impacted individuals in Maine were sent by U.S. Mail on January 9, 2019.
Date(s) of Discovery of Breach: A&A was notified of suspicious activity on August 17, 2018 and immediately launched a forensic investigation.  The forensic investigation concluded on December 7, 2018, revealing a breach impacting Maine residents.
Dates of Breach: Based upon A&A’s investigation to date, it appears that information entered on its website may have been exposed at various points in time, including from August 15, 2017 to January 4, 2019.

Date Notice Provided to Consumers: Once A&A’s forensic investigation revealed a breach impacting Maine residents, and had restored the integrity and security of the impacted systems, A&A prepared to notify those impacted individuals. Notifications to the impacted individuals in Maine were sent by U.S. Mail on January 9, 2019.
Date(s) of Discovery of Breach: A&A was notified of suspicious activity on August 17, 2018 and immediately launched a forensic investigation.  The forensic investigation concluded on December 7, 2018, revealing a breach impacting Maine residents.
Dates of Breach: Based upon A&A’s investigation to date, it appears that information entered on its website may have been exposed at various points in time, including from August 15, 2017 to January 4, 2019.
